summary: User asks if WorkflowClient will be available in PHP SDK soon. After maintainer clarification, the feature exists (called Worker due to different execution strategy) and examples are available in samples-php repository.
userImpact: Users were unclear about WorkflowClient availability in PHP SDK, impacting their ability to get started with the framework.
resolutionDetails: Maintainer clarified that WorkflowClient is available (called Worker) and provided link to samples-php for examples.
keyQuote: this SDK does have a Workflow client - Worker (we use different name due to different execution strategy)
